other_title: Science Fiction Journey to the West Starzinger
ＳＦ西遊記 スタージンガー
opening_theme: #1: "Starzinger no Uta (スタージンガーの歌)" by Isao Sasaki and Koorogi '73 (eps 1-29)
#2: "Uchuu no Senshi Starzinger (宇宙の戦士スタージンガー)" by Isao Sasaki and Kamiyo Youth Chorus (eps 30-64)
#3: "Bokura no Starzinger (ぼくらのスタージンガー)" by Isao Sasaki & Columbia Yurika Gokai (eps 65-72)
ending_theme: #1: "Hime no Tame nara (姫のためなら)" by Koorogi '73  (eps 1-64)
#2: "Hoshi ni Negai wo (星に願いを)" by Mitsuko Horie  (eps 65-72)
